item.description:
Movie time is 6:05PM, I will be at the theater by 5, and we will go in as soon as they let us, probably around 5:30.  Looks like it is playing in the large downstairs theater, so things can be very confusing.  Sometimes they let people line up in the inner lobby, sometimes not. 

Luckily Justin Timeberlake is a MUCH better actor than he is a singer.   This looks like a fascinating film.  You can live for ever....as long as you can earn/buy the hours.  

As I like to see these movies during opening weekend, it is usually a good idea to buy your tickets ahead of time....especially if it is a big movie with lots of buzz.  

If you miss the group ahead of time, come find us after.   We gather in the hallway outside of the theater we just saw the movie in to discuss the film a bit, allow for restroom breaks and to get a head count of all those who would like to go out after for drinks and munchies.

Managing the after event is much easier if everyone brings cash, so please plan ahead if you want to go out with the group after and bring cash.

Movie Details:

Release Date: October 28, 2011
Studio: 20th Century Fox
Director:Andrew Niccol
Screenwriter:Andrew Niccol
Starring:Justin Timberlake, Amanda Seyfried, Cillian Muphy, Vincent Kartheiser, Alex Pettyfer, Johnny Galecki, Olivia Wilde, Matthew Bomer
Genre: Thriller
MPAA Rating: Not Available
Official Website: TheRichCanLiveForever.com
Review: Not Available
DVD Review: Not Available
DVD: Not Available
Movie Poster: One-Sheet | Justin Timberlake Poster | Amanda Seyfried Poster
Production Stills: View here

Plot Summary: "In Time" presents a world where time has become the ultimate currency. You stop aging at 25, but there's a catch: you're genetically-engineered to live only one more year, unless you can buy your way out of it. The rich "earn" decades at a time (remaining at age 25), becoming essentially immortal, while the rest beg, borrow or steal enough hours to make it through the day. When a man from the wrong side of the tracks is falsely accused of murder, he is forced to go on the run with a beautiful hostage. Living minute to minute, the duo's love becomes a powerful tool in their war against the system.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a meetup pin. If the movie is showing upstairs, I will grab a table by the windows at the top of the escalator. If the movie is showing downstairs, I will be near the ropes by the concession stand.
item.name: In Time----6:05 Show
